content:
Write a seventh email this time using the following prompt which is a follow-up story from the previous email and a final conclusion: "To have your personal and professional life disrupted by your sensitivity to others around you, sets you back every time you think you have made a step forward. That is where a lot of Dranow’s lyrical inspiration comes from. 

The song “Made it Another Day” speaks directly to this experience. “You go to sleep with the weight of the world on your shoulders and then wake the next morning free of those feelings and being surprised you’ve made it another day to take on your daily struggle once again. The lyric ‘Like a rat in a wheel’ brings the image to the life of the never-ending struggle to get your personal life in order only to be dissuaded at the end of every day and that making progress in the inevitable headwinds that buffet your life.” Gary explains. 

Gary Dranow is thrilled to be performing and sharing his music with fans once again. His unwavering spirit and determination are an inspiration to all who have followed his journey. Keep your ears open for more Gary Dranow and The Manic Emotions in 2023 and beyond".

Please write in English language.
